Movement:Transport.definition: an artifact (weapon or vehicle) or a person is moved from one place to another

Personnel:Elect.definition: a candidate wins an election designed to determine a position for an organization or government

Personnel:Start-Position.definition: a person begins working for (or changes offices within) an organization or government

Personnel:Nominate.definition: a person is proposed for a job or position in an organization or government by the appropriate person, through official channels

Personnel:End-Position.definition: a person stops working for (or changes offices within) an organization or government

Conflict:Attack.definition: a violent physical act causing harm or damage

Contact:Meet.definition: two or more entities come together at a single location and interact with one another face-to-face

Life:Marry.definition: two people are married under the legal definition

Transaction:Transfer-Money.definition: the giving, receiving, borrowing, or lending money when it is not in the context of purchasing something

Conflict:Demonstrate.definition: a large number of people come together in a public area to protest or demand some sort of official action, including, but are not limited to, protests, sit-ins, strikes, and riots.

Business:End-Org.definition: an ORGANIZATION ceases to exist (in other words ‘goes out of business’)

Justice:Sue.definition: a court proceeding has been initiated for the purposes of determining the liability of a person, organization accused of committing a crime or neglecting a commitment

Life:Die.definition: the life of a person ends

Justice:Arrest-Jail.definition: the movement of a person is constrained by a state actor, or a state actor takes official custody of a person for the purposes of evaluating legal liability in a criminal activity

Contact:Phone-Write.definition: two or more people directly engage in discussion which does not take place face-to-face

Transaction:Transfer-Ownership.definition: the buying, selling, loaning, borrowing, giving, or receiving of artifacts or organizations

Justice:Execute.definition: the life of a PERSON is taken by a state actor

Justice:Trial-Hearing.definition: a court proceeding has been initiated for the purposes of determining the guilt or innocence of a person, organization accused of committing a crime, or a state actor officially gathers to discuss some criminal legal matter

Life:Be-Born.definition: a person is given birth to.

Justice:Charge-Indict.definition: a person or organization is accused of a crime by a state actor, or a state actor takes official legal action to follow up on an accusation

Justice:Convict.definition: a person or organization has been found guilty of a crime

Justice:Sentence.definition: the punishment (particularly incarceration) for the defendent of a trial is issued by a state actor

Business:Declare-Bankruptcy.definition: an Entity officially requests legal protection from debt collection due to an extremely negative balance sheet

Justice:Release-Parole.definition: a state actor ends its custody of a person

Justice:Fine.definition: a state actor issues a financial punishment to a person or organization, typically as a result of court proceedings

Justice:Pardon.definition: a head-of-state or their appointed representative lifts a sentence imposed by the judiciary

Justice:Appeal.definition: the decision of a court is taken to a higher court for review

Justice:Extradite.definition: a person is sent by a state actor from one place to another place for the purposes of legal proceedings there

Life:Divorce.definition: two people are officially divorced under the legal definition of divorce

Business:Merge-Org.definition: two or more organization come together to form a new organization

Justice:Acquit.definition: a trial ends but fails to produce a conviction
